markdownRemark.html: Linguaintensa is a Spanish school that offers an effective and innovative method based on conversation, taught through videoconferencing. This is an innovative visual method to learn or improve your Spanish. Live tailor-made Spanish lessons with a qualified teacher through your personal computer.
